episode: I helped my mother get some things done around her house and it really made her happy.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I helped my mother get some things done around her house and it really made her happy.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's very thoughtful of you.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It made me feel good to see her enjoying her space and I love to get to spend time with her.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's great that you have a close relationship with your mom.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It is. We had fun too. We cleaned out her spare room that is full of clothes and accessories so we tried on a lot of things together.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Sounds like you had a blast together!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: We did and now she has more open space in the room and she can enjoy the things she actually does use.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's wonderful, very fulfilling to help her declutter.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It is good to know she has a clean space and some new good memories.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm sure she appreciates it, and so do you.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I do and I want her to know I am there for her, big things and small ones.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's very sweet of you, I'm sure she feels loved.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I hope she will call on me if she ever needs something you know?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm sure she will, you've shown her you're reliable.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I also like to take the opportunities to visit her at home, just to be sure everything is ok.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's thoughtful of you, I'm sure she appreciates the check-ins.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I try to do the big chores like bathtub scrubbing for her when I visit.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's so kind of you, a big help to her.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I would hate to see her get hurt doing a chore I could have helped with.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That shows how much you care about her well-being.
